Thank you for contacting us. We would like to clarify that this repository provides a comprehensive set of tools for managing and processing transactions, designed to offer users enhanced security, control, and flexibility. These features help ensure that your funds remain protected and that all transactions are carried out safely and reliably.

Based on our review, we have marked this issue as resolved on our end.

Next Steps:
